Description:
Perfect home or investment!
Whether you're looking for a great family home or to grow your investment portfolio, this custom brick home ticks all the boxes! Check out this list of features!
- 3 spacious bedrooms, all with built-in robes
- 2 living spaces
- Updated kitchen with breakfast bar
- Brand new carpets
- Hardwood floorboards
- Freshly painted
- Sunken lounge with fireplace & split system
- Central heating
- Timber lined ceiling
- Skylight pouring light into the living areas
- Off street parking for 4 cars
- Seconds to the ring road and only 10mins to Geelong CBD
- Amazing tenant with lease to March 2018
Stop reading, start calling!
Insights: 50 Matthews Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat as a pin in a central location.
This well cared for brick veneer home has been renovated through out to offer a comfortable and convenient lifestyle situated within close proximity to all major amenities and adjacent Hendy Reserve this charming property is sure to tick a lot of boxes for all buyers alike. Comprising of a large lounge with gas heater that opens through to the dining area and stylish kitchen that provides S/S A/C as well as ample bench space and stainless steel oven. Just off the main hall you'll find the 3 spacious bedrooms with easy access to the stunning central bathroom which offers shower, separate bath tub and single vanity while towards the rear of the home a 2nd W/C is located in the laundry. Outside the rear yard provides a safe and secure space for kids and pets to enjoy along with a SLUG and large side driveway perfect for off street parking all situated on a large 602m2 approx. allotment. Currently tenanted at $280 pw this is a wonderful opportunity to secure a neat investment property just a few minutes drive to the Corio Shopping Centre and quality schools for all ages.
Insights: 117 Plantation Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Attention All First Home Buyers And Investors
With Corio Shopping Centre and the Ring Road both only moments away, the convenience of this home to live in or rent out couldn't be any more obvious. With schools, parkland and public transport only a short stroll away, the absolute value on offer here is not to be missed.
Neatly presented and structurally sound, this home comprises light filled kitchen, adjoining meals area leading into a large central living space with gas ducted heating and split system A/C.
The large master bedroom includes BIR's, with the second and third bedrooms serviced by neat family bathroom and separate laundry.
Outside offers a large sun soaked 525m2 (approx) allotment accompanied by a swimming pool and man cave surrounded by low-maintenance gardens offering you heaps of privacy.
Set in one of Corio's most established streets with a potential rental return of approximately $280 - $300 per week, this home boasts easy access to the primary & secondary schools, Corio Shopping Village, easy access to the surf coast and the Geelong Ring Road - Simply move in and enjoy!
Insights: 90 Vermont Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Fully Renovated Modern Family Home
Situated in a sought-after location only minutes from local schools, major shopping centre Corio Central, public transport & with easy access to Geelong Ring Road for Geelong CBD, Melbourne CBD & Surf Coast commuters, is this beautifully presented 3 bedroom family home. Fully renovated and ready for you to move-in and unpack featuring 3 good sized bedrooms all with BIRs and WIR to main, modern bathroom and ensuite, spacious light & bright kitchen with ample storage space, stone bench-tops, gas cooking, dishwasher and quality stainless steel appliances. Spacious lounge room with a gas log heater and a split system for all-year-round comfort, central bathroom with separate bath & shower and a separate toilet. Quality fixtures and fittings throughout including tinted windows in all bedrooms & lounge room, low voltage LED downlights throughout the entire home including the exterior for a modern feel and a fully plumbed outdoor area for BBQ/heater use. If all that isnt enough, a large remote-controlled garage with a separate switch board with a safety switch, 15 amp power point for welders/machinery, Tv Coax point plus a large yard with side access via double lock-up gates with a 3 metre opening perfect for caravan or boat owners.
This could possibly be the best property on the market at the moment and it will not last long! Currently tenanted for $320/week until September 2017.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Immaculate family home in Cloverdale Estate.
From the moment you enter this property, the first impressions are of a much loved and cared for home! Nestled in the ever popular Cloverdale Estate, ideal for first home buyers, families or investors searching for an immaculate home ready to move straight into and enjoy. This exceptional property reflects the care and attention by the current owners and provides a generous meals area upon entry adjoining the updated kitchen with gas cooking. The 3 bedrooms in total can be found towards the rear of the home close by the central bathroom and laundry. The large lounge offers S/S A/C and provides access to the oversized undercover alfresco area in the front yard. Out the back of the home secure parking is ensured in the large single brick garage to the side of the property. Location is ideal just a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages & sporting facilities nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!
Insights: 50 Cloverdale Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime investment opportunity!
Capitalise on the wonderful opportunity to purchase this great first home or investment that boasts plenty of appeal for the Melbourne commuter with the Princes Highway close by. The creative and innovative buyer will appreciate the freedom to renovate and transform the property into a stylish home that suits their needs located on approx. 633m2 of land, perfect for first home buyers & investors alike! Comprising of a generous lounge upon entry with a gas heater, the property then offers 3 sizeable bedrooms, a neat central bathroom, laundry and a spacious kitchen complete with gas cooking & meals area. Outside you're sure to be impressed by the extensive rear yard, fully fenced with an ample side driveway and paved alfresco area perfect for entertaining family and friends. Public transport is available nearby, with close proximity to multiple reserves, Corio shopping centre and Geelong's Ring Road, location is ideal. Don't delay, inspections are a must for this charming home.

Description:
Great Starter In Fast Growing Location
Set on approximately 392m2 and recently updated is this gorgeous family home, conveniently positioned in a family friendly pocket that is sure to impress a motivated investor, first home buyer or young family.
Modern comfort forms a wonderful combination throughout, delivering three bedrooms; two with free standing robes, serviced by a central bathroom with separate bath and shower.
Offering a spacious light filled lounge area with an electric feature fireplace and split system, a functional modern kitchen, which comes complete with free standing gas cooktop/oven, dishwasher, split system heating/cooling and ample cupboard space. Featuring beautifully polished timber floorboards throughout, this home is ready to be loved and enjoyed.
Outside you will find an abundance of space surrounding the home, completed with a fully fenced private rear yard and garden shed for extra storage.
Perfectly located and within easy reach to all the amenities your lifestyle could want and need; only a short walk to Corio Central Shopping Centre, public transport and easy access to the ring road and local schools, this family home is one you don’t want to miss!
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Ideal investment opportunity.
This vibrant and well looked after home has been designed with maximum family comfort in mind. Immaculately presented the charming 3 bedroom brick veneer house has been stunningly renovated throughout. Take advantage of all the hard work that has already been done, a solid investment opportunity for those wanting to extend their portfolios the property is currently tenanted at $300 pw with a 12 month lease in place. The open planned living area provides floorboards & an abundance of space with split system A/C, while the stylish kitchen which overlooks the meals area boasts stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space. Three comfortable bedrooms in total all containing ceiling fans & BIR's are serviced by the family sized bathroom, freshly tiled with neutral tones. Outside provides more than enough room to entertain family and friends, situated on a large 534m2 allotment the rear yard provides a sensational deck area, along with a generous 2 car garage and single carport. This elegant family home has been finished to perfection with close attention detail in all aspects. Situated just seconds to the Ring Road with close proximity to quality schools for all ages this home provides easy access to all major amenities including Corio Shopping Centre, public transport & is only a short drive to Geelong's CBD this stunning property really does have it all!
Insights: 173 Plantation Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Get in Quick!
Positioned in a premier pocket of Corio near the Geelong Ring Road, this double-front brick home occupies a 525sqm allotment. Meticulously renovated throughout, bespoke features include light-filled interiors, neutral tones, aluminium windows, heating and cooling. Featuring 3 bedrooms with built-in-robes, this property additionally offers a modern bathroom, plus formal lounge and separate meals area. A contemporary kitchen offers ample bench space, storage, updated stove and oven. The oversized single garage with through roller door provides access to the covered entertainment area and low-maintenance rear yard. Conveniently located close to shops, schools and public transport, this residence is a great family home. Currently tenanted at $300 per week, with a 12 month lease in place, reap the rewards of a passive income today!

Neat investment.
This extremely convenient location will be sure to please, nestled away in a quiet court location yet so close to everything! If you are a first home owner or an astute investor, here is the perfect opportunity. Situated on an approximate allotment of 638m2 with easy access to all amenities, public transport, schools, shopping centre and a great location for access to the Melbourne road for the day trip to Melbourne. Beautifully presented the home offers floorboards through out with a comfortable lounge containing S/S A/C & gas heating, practical kitchen with 900ml stainless steel oven, large dining area, 3 comfortable bedrooms (2 with BIR's) as well as updated central bathroom. The charming brick veneer home provides secure parking with a spacious double garage at the rear, undercover patio at the back door as well as ample room left over for the whole family to enjoy. Situated within easy reach of the Corio Train station, the home is easily accessible to all you need and more. Currently tenanted to lovely long term tenants for $280pw - please enquire to arrange and inspection.

Description:
"Immaculate Living Inside & Out!"
Impressive property inside & out perfect for first home buyers or investors alike. Beautifully updated with a hampton style feel there is nothing left to do but move in and enjoy. Perfectly positioned with all necessary amenities at your doorstep which include schools, public transport, shopping centres & easy access to the Ring Road. Featuring a covered alfresco area & 4 car garage this property will tick all the boxes. Enquire today because it will be gone tomorrow!
* 3 Bedrooms
* Renovated kitchen, s/steel gas cooker & canopy rangehood
* Updated bathroom with separate toilet
* Gas heating & split system a/c
* Covered alfresco entertainment area
* 4 car garage, carport plus garden shed
* Private & secure rear yard
* Potential rental return of $300 to $320 per week
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Open Inspection Saturday - CANCELLED
This well presented home tucked away in a quiet location, offers an outstanding opportunity to get into the property market at an affordable price!
The home features a stylish updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ample bench space, opening into a sunny dining area, complete with timber floors and split system. The timber flooring continues through to the open living room which is flooded in natural light through large North facing windows. All three bedrooms are a good size with the master featuring mirrored built in robes. Central heating throughout the home, assures year round comfort. Outside youll find a huge undercover deck; perfect for relaxing or entertaining in style year round.
A large, single concreted & powered garage and attached carport provide plenty of room for parking and the low maintenance yard allows lots of space for the kids to play. All this and only minutes away from Corio Village, schools, kindergartens, shops and public transport! Weather youre looking for a family home or a great investment, this one ticks all the boxes! Estimated rental - $280 per week. Inspection is a must!

Description:
A neat 3 Bedroom home that wont last!
Corio has become a sought after suburb in the Geelong region for those looking for great value! This property is no exception! Sitting on 530m2 block and recently updated this property has all you need and more! Comprising 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, central lounge, outdoor undercover area, garden shed and plenty of car accommodation. Also featuring a new oven in the kitchen and recently painted throughout and with a low maintenance garden front and rear this property will appeal to many. An ideal property for FHBs, investors or downsizers this provides a no fuss purchase for those wanting to take advantage of the Corio boom!

Description:
A Bright Family Future!
Situated in a sought-after location only minutes from local schooling, Corio Central Shopping Plaza, public transport & within easy reach of The Ring Road for Geelong CBD, Melbourne CBD & Surf Coast access is this neatly presented property which offers more than meets the eye and is ideal for the first home buyer or investor. There are three well - proportioned bedrooms on offer with BIRs an ensuite to the master and a good - sized family bathroom with a bath and shower, and a separate toilet which services the remaining two bedrooms. The large central living area with split system heating and cooling adjoins the dining area and functional kitchen.
Two large and separate undercover alfresco areas, one paved and one decked provide a multitude of opportunities for outdoor entertaining and sheltered play space for the kids along with a generous block for family pets, veggie gardens or the backyard cricket match! To round out this family friendly package is a spacious shed ideal for the tradie or home handyperson and is accessible by side driveway and secured behind double gates.
With an approx rent return of $330 per week for the investors amongst you.
View this one quick smart to avoid disappointment!
